body:
> I have add an interceptor achieve the config.
if plugin.hessian.use_uri_name_as_operate_name=false

Document update required.
Including supported-list and configuration item docs.

Here is the [test report](http://github.com/SkywalkingTest/agent-integration-test-report/tree/master/2019/7/wayilau/testReport-master-2019-07-03-17-29.md) and [validate logs](http://35.227.88.23:49001/job/skywalking-agent-test/160/artifact/workspace/logs/validate_2019-07-03-17-29.log)
@wayilau The results are all failure.

> @wayilau The results are all failure.

sorry, i have add an interceptor, the expected data is not right now.

> > @wayilau The results are all failure.
> 
> sorry, i have add an interceptor, the expected data is not right now.

I will fix the expected data for a while. then to run the testcase again.
I think this is in discussion in slack already. Why report again?
hi, bro, I still can't parse the data_binary clearly, and I can't find the corresponding proto file of the segment table!
You don't need to do that. Why are you asking this?
I just thought that if i don't want to collect trace and I don't need to stop application server and remove skywalking

> You don't need to do that. Why are you asking this?

I just thought that if i don't want to collect trace and I don't need to stop application server and remove skywalking
The agent change application codes automatically. So, you can't make it undo at the runtime.
You just need to read codes. This is an open source project, right?

I think the copy function should remain the same, but you can jump to the trace UI by clicking endpoint and search by traceId.
or display both the endpoint name and the traceId.

> Database SLA unit errorï¼ŒShould be divided by 100.

Yes, this is confirmed to be a bug.

> Database ResponseTime unit error.

I assume yes. @TinyAllen I don't think we have a duration less than 1ms, so this should be a bug, please confirm.

This log seems normal. But which storage are you using? Since you are talking about a reboot, the OAP runs in H2 storage default, which is an in-memory DB. The metadata lost, and no data will show unless you reboot the agent. Also, in this case, should be able to see many NPE(s) in OAP logs.

No, segment ID can't be used in trace query, which is the original design of the copy.

We have some alternative ways, but still, this should be tagged as a bug.

> You just need to read codes. This is an open source project, right?

thanks, I'm reading it now, it's a little difficult for a fresh man, thanks anyway!
I deployed skywalking6.2.0(official releases) ,storage is elasticsearch
Then reboot is irrelevant. We reboot our service routinely, nothing happens. Please pay attention to your ElasticSearch status.
First is frontend avg, so instance's top is backend avg. I think only you have data access to check.
Backend use storage avg function, very simple one, you could recheck the data to see what happens.

One more thing, please recheck your OAP logs and ES status, today, we are using ES bulk to update metrics, if there is error there, maybe the data would be updated accurately, as for instance and service CPMs are different raw data.
Duplicate as before. ElasticSearch 6 is new already. We haven't plan to upgrade in short term

> ## Cases List
> 
> | Case description | Status | Cases|
> |:-----|:-----:|:-----:|
> |solr| **12 passed. 0 failed**| [click me](#solr) |
>
You need to fix conflict first.
Ref #443
The PR has delayed for long time, so I works in a new branch. This branch lose some commits. Could I close this and open another PR?
move to #3002
Why do you think there is issue in cluster mode? How does alarm cause conflicts with cluster? I am not following.

> Why do you think there is issue in cluster mode? How does alarm cause conflicts with cluster? I am not following.

in cluster mode, every service instance may  check the alarm rule and  callback send the alarm message.
such as i want to receive one alarm message in 2 minutes but i receive two same messages actually
I don't think you could receive two same messages. It could be alarming for different entities. I think you have understood the data flow.
Ref test case, https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-auto-integration-testcases/pull/78
this class? `AlarmStandardPersistence`
@lt964709769  LRU could cause dirty read. Because the oap node doing register could change because cluster size change in some case.
Read how we do distributed aggregration. Don't guess what we are doing.
Thanks, I will learn it.

This log just shows you, your backend can't support the payload  generated by agents. So agent choose to abandon rather than crash your application memory.
We have explained this many many times. Please search issue before submit a duplicate one.

my error may be not same as the others, because when the agent abandoned the data, the server cann't save any trace segment any more, if the reason is payload, the server my lost some data, but in my situation it lost all the data, i debug it found the server recive it, but cann't save it any more, i do not know why yet.

and in the class of "ConsumerThread" and "MultipleChannelsConsumer",  the variable of â€œhasDataâ€ always is false. so it cann't call the method of "createBulkProcessor" in the class of "ElasticSearchClient"
That class is a basic class for skywalking queue. It is empty means nothing in the queue.
You need to check oap log.
Set up the env at local with h2 by following quick start. Then dive into more complex way.
First, check service and endpoint numbers on UI.

> Set up the env at local with h2 by following quick start. Then dive into more complex way.

Do I have to configure anything before running startup.bat ?
Quick start says that 

> Storage, use H2 by default, in order to make sure, don't need further deployment.

And version 6.1.0 is fine as what I did in 6.2.0



> First, check service and endpoint numbers on UI.

The dashboard bar shows right info including optional services, endpoints and instances.
The trace page is able to show requests as well.
What do you mean can't? Can you explain a little?
What the storage says? I don't know why is negative.
@TinyAllen Which metrics names are using here?
SkyWalking doesn't include that.
Based on edge(line) metrics and node metrics. They are different.

I find out the reason, the bug is caused by auto Flush and the method of "batchPersistence", because the ES  need lock the same lock when flush and internalAdd(which called by batchPersistence). so i delete the auto flush the result is  so far are normal. the underneath is my thread dump brief:

"DataCarrier.RECORD_PERSISTENT.BulkConsumePool.0.Thread" #24 daemon prio=5 os_prio=0 tid=0x000000002585a800 nid=0xc1c waiting for monitor entry [0x000000002715f000]

How to understand it?
We need issue and pull request in English. Could you change it?
I used the 6.2.0 webapp and the 6.2.0 oap , I'm got the same result, but I used 6.1.0 webapp, 6.2.0 oap, it's working for me.

> 
> 
> What do you mean can't? Can you explain a little?

1. The Endpoint charts can't refresh automatically after changing Current Endpoint drop-down box.
2. The Instance charts can't refresh automatically after changing Current Instance drop-down box.
@TinyAllen Please help on check. Appreciate.
You could click the </> to show.
What can I do for *Agent plugins Test -Failure*?

> What can I do for _Agent plugins Test -Failure_?

nothing, don't be bothered by this, it's still under construction and the failure won't affect the merging process (if approved ), but the travis-ci failure affects, take a look why it fails :)
Thank you for your answer. @kezhenxu94

1. Elasticsearch storage is never designed for small scale case. We change it for improving stability, which if you used the 6.1.0 or before in high payload is very obvious.
1. Downstream is just about dataset size, but it has same write and read frequency. 

The key of this change is delete impact, which will make elasticsearch crash easier than more indexes. Also, feel free to disable month level downstream, I personally don't think it is necessary, it is there just for keep UI and functions consistently and perfectly for new users
thanks for your comment.
You need to delete all indexes when uograde to 6.2.0. We indicate it clearly in changlog.
For UI 6.1.0, I don't believe it is working for 6.2.0. We changed the topology query API, how is possible it still working?
All issues in English. And if you are learning open source project, you should read source codes. All features are there
We can't support to teach everyone step by step. That is unrealistic.
